item.title: Dangeroud trip hazards to left and right of entrance to 141 Leckhampton Road., 25th June
item.description:
To the left and right of the entrance to 141 Leckhampton road, the roots from the London Plane have caused the pavement to be raised and created a trip hazard. Vehicles have also knocked over a bollard and left a dangerous stump protruding, months later, nothing has been done, save for some red and white cones and plastic barriers, which have fallen over and are now being driven over by cars parking on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 139, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Cracked and rocking paving slab on the corner, 25th June
item.description:
In front of the shops are many cracked paving slabs BUT one on the corner (eg going from Coop door to chemist) has a corner cracked and the slab wobbles - almost tips.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Windyridge Gardens, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge overgrown, 25th June
item.description:
This has been reported weeks ago and is getting worse! LYNDLEY CHASE BISHOPS CLEEVE JUNCTION ONTO STOKE ORCHARD ROAD! GRASS OPPOSITE HAS BEEN CUT, WHERE THERE ARE NO SIDE ROADS!!! CAR GOING OVER THE SPEED LIMIT NEARLY WENT INTO THE SIDE OF ME AS I WAS TRYING TO EDGE OUT ON TO THE MAIN ROAD!!! THIS HAS BEEN REPORTED NUMEROUS TIMES!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
